mapper.select: SELECT seq,uid,ing,case_of,kind_of, gu, dong, scale_meter, scale_pyung, sale_money_int, sale_money_unit, up_floor, jeonse_money_int, jeonse_money_unit, rent_save_int, rent_save_unit, rent_int, rent_unit FROM `CZ_ITEMS` WHERE `case_of`=#{case_of} ORDER BY seq DESC
SELECT * FROM `CZ_ITEMS` WHERE case_of=#{case_of} AND gu=#{gu}
